seo.whatIsTitle: What is AI-powered PDF chat and how does it work?
seo.whatIsContent: **AI-powered PDF chat** combines **artificial intelligence** with **document processing** to enable **conversational interaction** with PDF documents. This technology uses **PDF text extraction**, **natural language processing**, and **large language models** to understand document content and provide **intelligent responses** to user questions. The system **processes PDF text locally** using **browser-based extraction**, then uses AI to **analyze, summarize, and answer questions** about the document content. This approach transforms **static documents** into **interactive knowledge bases**, making **research, studying, and document analysis** more efficient and accessible. Learn more about [document AI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Document_AI) and [PDF processing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF).
seo.howToTitle: How to use the Chat with PDF tool?
howToSteps: **Upload your PDF file** - it's processed locally in your browser (never uploaded)
**Wait for text extraction** - the document content is analyzed automatically
**Start asking questions** about the PDF content in natural language
**Get AI-powered answers** with relevant quotes and references from your document
seo.useCasesTitle: Common use cases for AI PDF chat
useCases: **Research efficiency** - quickly extract information from academic papers and reports
**Legal document review** - ask specific questions about contracts, agreements, and policies
**Business analysis** - analyze financial reports, business plans, and market research
**Educational support** - study textbooks, research papers, and educational materials
**Technical documentation** - query API docs, manuals, and technical specifications

faq.question: How accurate are AI responses about PDF content?
faq.answer: AI responses are generally **very accurate** when based on **clear, readable text** in the PDF. However, accuracy may vary with **scanned documents, poor OCR quality, or complex formatting**. The AI can **quote specific sections** to help you verify information.

faq.question: Is my PDF data secure and private?
faq.answer: Yes! **PDFs are processed locally** in your browser and **never uploaded** to our servers. Only **extracted text** (not the original file) is sent to **Google Gemini AI** for analysis. Your **documents remain completely private** throughout the process.

faq.question: What types of PDFs work best with AI chat?
faq.answer: AI PDF chat works best with **text-based PDFs** like **research papers, reports, books, and documents with clear formatting**. It may struggle with **image-only PDFs, complex layouts, or documents with poor text recognition**.
